dialogue.text: Hi! What can I get for you?
dialogue.zh:
嗨! What 可以 我 get 你?
こんにちは! What できます 私 get for あなた?

可以 我 customize my drink?
できます 私 customize my drink?

dialogue.text: Of course. What drink are you thinking?
dialogue.zh:
Of course. What drink 是 你 thinking?
Of course. What drink are あなた thinking?

An 冰的 拿鐵.
An アイス ラテ.

dialogue.text: What would you like to change?
dialogue.zh:
What would 你 like to change?
What would あなた like to change?

Less 冰, 請.
Less 氷, お願いします.

當然. 任何 牛奶 preference?
もちろん. Any ミルク preference?

可以 我 get soy 牛奶?
できます 私 get soy ミルク?

是的. 任何 糖?
はい. Any 砂糖?

Just a little 糖.
Just a little 砂糖.

你 想要 it stronger?
Do あなた want it stronger?

是的, one extra shot.
はい, one extra shot.

不 problem. What size?
いいえ problem. What size?

中.
ミディアム.

here or to go?
For here or to go?

here.
For here.

dialogue.text: Would you like a lid anyway?
dialogue.zh:
Would 你 like a lid anyway?
Would あなた like a lid anyway?

不 lid, 請.
いいえ lid, お願いします.

Anything else, like a pastry?
Anything else, like a pastry?

Not today.
Not today.

dialogue.text: Alright. Please wait at the pickup area.
dialogue.zh:
Alright. 請 wait at the pickup area.
Alright. お願いします wait at the pickup area.

好的.
わかりました.

dialogue.text: We’ll call you when it’s ready.
dialogue.zh:
We’ll call 你 when it’s ready.
We’ll call あなた when it’s ready.

謝謝.
ありがとう.

dialogue.text: Just to confirm: medium iced latte, soy milk, less ice.
dialogue.zh:
Just to confirm: 中 冰的 拿鐵, soy 牛奶, less 冰.
Just to confirm: ミディアム アイス ラテ, soy ミルク, less 氷.

是的, that’s right.
はい, that’s right.

Extra shot included.
Extra shot included.

太好了.
いいですね.

Enjoy!
Enjoy!

謝謝 你!
ありがとう あなた!
